coded_answer.p: Last Saturday I went to your theatre to see the new musical show; "Over The Rainbow".

It was writingwritten onin the advertisement that Danny BROOK was going to playstar with Tina TRUELOVE, but it was not him who playedstarred. That disappointed both me and the people who just went to see him.

And regarding the Timestimestime;, the show hadwas meant to start at 19:30, however it started at 20:15. Therefore, people there had to wait for 45 minutes. Also, thereit was said there to bewould be discounts foron the tickettickets but I sawhad nothing like this. All the people there gavepaid the same amount of money. After the show, I went to the restaurant in the theatre to eat something but it was closed because it was being cleaned that day.
I had a horrible evening, just the opposite of what I expected, so I want my money back.
Unfortunately, Pat wasn't very good at keeping secrets. It was a big faultmistake to gavetell her a secret, especially an important one.

It all started two years ago. Rod was a happy man at that timestime. One day, while he was gardening, he saw an old lady being kidnapped by some strange manmen, who he ran after and he caught one of whomone of whom he caught. Just then, the strange man took out his gun. Rod jumped on him and the man killed himself ,bywith his own gun. Nobody saw orand nobody heard what had happened.
Rod told this to nobody, except Pat, his best friend. One day, when they were arguing, Pat was very anxious and told what she knew to the police.
Rod was arrested that day and was sent to prison. He then waswas then killed by the other man who escaped that day and was caught soon afterwards.
Rod's grave is now in prison. And these lines writeswriteare written on his gravestone:
Here lies the poor body ofbody of poor Rod,
This is why poor Rod died.
